                      Master Rank Armor | Monster Hunter World Wiki


                      Master Rank Armor or Iceborne Armor in Monster Hunter: World (MHW) refers to the protective gear added with the paid Iceborne Expansion. These Armor Sets, Charms, Decorations and Palico equipment is exclusive to the paid DLC. They usually have the look and feel of the Monsters utilized to craft each piece or set. Players may also outfit their Palicoes with specific equipment.

                      For Layered Armor in Iceborne, please see our Layered Armor page.

                      What is Master Rank Armor in Monster Hunter: World?

                      Master Rank armor offers higher defense values compared to High Rank, providing better protection against the tougher monsters in the game. Additionally, Master Rank armor sets often come with new and improved skills, enhancing a hunter's capabilities.

                      Armor Skills in Monster Hunter: World

                      Skills found in armor in Monster Hunter: World differs from previous entries to the series, in this game equipping an armor piece with a skill in it will automatically give you said ability in the rank indicated by the piece. Equipping many set pieces with the same skill will increase this skills rank, providing increasing bonuses as you equip more pieces. Some skills have many levels to increase while others may only have a single level. 

                      Monster Hunter: World Armor Decorations and Accesories

                      In addition to the regular bonuses provided by armor pieces, you can equip (given that they have a slot for it) Decorations into your amor pieces that will boost or add new skills to them. To further customize you abilities you may also equip Charms and Mantles that will provide additional skill upgrades.

                      What is the Best Master Rank Armor set in Monster Hunter World?

                      While opinions may vary, some standout Master Rank armor sets include the Velkhana set for its ice-focused skills, the Namielle set for elemental builds, and the Teostra set for its Master's Touch skill, which reduces sharpness loss on critical hits. The "meta" can change based on updates and balancing, so staying informed is key.

                      Master Rank Armor in Monster Hunter: World (MHW) Iceborne is comprised of DLC Sets, Accessories and enhanced via Decorations. They usually have the look and feel of the Monsters utilized to craft each piece or set. Players may also outfit their Palicoes with specific equipment.
